name: Boba's Root Rescue
description:
Something's gotten into the roots & Boba's friends are all tangled up! Help Boba the Badger to navigate the burrows to free Beni & his fluffle of friends whilst watching out for the dangerous mutated roots that have started to take over.

In this 2D Platformer you'll need to navigate levels to find and free trapped critters. Once all the critters are saved you'll need to high tail outta there and find the Exit!

Originally made for GGJ2023 & still being tinkered with :)
